name: Sunless Sky
description:
In Sunless Sky, you will take the role of Brandon Alder, a soldier from the nation of Orial that suddenly found itself being attacked by its neighbour, Hasvara. You are sent to try and dispatch one of Hasvara's most influential soldiers, Signe Endrick, with a surprise attack and ambush tactics, but circumstances see you trapped in a cave with her, with your only hope of finding a way out, being to go further in.

Will you try to work together? Or perhaps set off on your own? The choice is yours.

  • Travel through a mysterious cave and discover a truth that was hidden long ago!
  • Choose between two major routes depending on your attitude towards Signe!
  • Shape Brandon's fighting style with your choices by increasing his stats!
  • Feel the pain as the wound system threatens to bring you down if you're too careless!

So come in, get started, this cave isn't going to explore itself!
